definition: to burst open/to split at the seam
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The seams parted when I washed the dress.
sentences.chinese: 這件連衣裙在洗的時候綻線了。

sentences.english: The sweater has raveled at the elbow.
sentences.chinese: 這件毛衣的肘部綻線了。
